name: Titanium.UI.iOS.Stepper
summary: A widget used to increment and decrement a value.

events.name: change
events.summary: Fired every time the stepper value changes.

properties.name: value
properties.summary: The current value of the stepper.

properties.name: minimum
properties.summary: The minimum value of the stepper.

properties.name: maximum
properties.summary: The maximum value of the stepper.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

properties.name: autorepeat
properties.summary: If YES, the user pressing and holding on the stepper repeatedly alters value. The default value is YES.

properties.name: backgroundImage
properties.summary: Background image for the stepper in its normal state, specified as a local file path or URL.
properties.description: Also sets the background image for other stepper states (focused, selected), unless they've been specified explicitly. On iOS, if backgroundDisabledImage is unset, the image will appear faded to indicate being disabled. Also on iOS, if backgroundSelectedImage is unset, the image will be darkened to indicate being selected.

properties.name: continuous
properties.summary: If YES, value change events are sent immediately when the value changes during user interaction. If NO, a value change event is sent when user interaction ends. The default value is YES.

properties.name: decrementDisabledImage
properties.summary: Background image for the stepper decrement button in its disabled state, specified as a local file path or URL. The decrement button enters a disabled state ones the value is equal to the minimumValue , setting the enabled property to false will have no effect to decrement button state.

properties.name: decrementImage
properties.summary: Background image for the stepper decrement button in its normal state, specified as a local file path or URL.
properties.description: Also sets the background image for the other stepper states (disabled, focused, selected), unless they've been specified explicitly, except for iOS, which requires a backgroundImage.

properties.name: enabled
properties.summary: Determines if the stepper is enabled or disabled.

properties.name: incrementDisabledImage
properties.summary: Background image for the stepper increment button in its disabled state, specified as a local file path or URL.The increment button enters a disabled state ones the value is equal to the maximumValue , setting the enabled property to false will have no effect to increment button state.

properties.name: incrementImage
properties.summary: Background image for the stepper increment button in its normal state, specified as a local file path or URL.
properties.description: Also sets the background image for the other stepper states (disabled, focused, selected), unless they've been specified explicitly, except for iOS, which requires a backgroundImage.

properties.name: maximum
properties.summary: The maximum value the stepper will be set to, the value must be greater than the minimum value. If you attempt to set a value equal to or lower than minimum, the system will default the value to 100.

properties.name: minimum
properties.summary: The minimum value the stepper will be set to, the value must be smaller than the maximum value. If you attempt to set a value equal to or greater than maximum, the system will default the value to 0.

properties.name: steps
properties.summary: The value the stepper will increment and decrement by, default value for this property is 1. When setting a new value, it must be greater than 1.

properties.name: tintColor
properties.summary: Sets the color for the widget, any backgroundImages added will be set to the same color.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: value
properties.summary: The current value of the stepper.

properties.name: wraps
properties.summary: If YES, incrementing beyond maximum sets value to minimum. likewise, decrementing below minimum sets value to maximum. If NO, the stepper does not increment beyond maximum nor does it decrement below minimum but rather holds at those values. The default value is NO.
